Text:
function EP03_32()
    --.エピローグ-1【9月第4週】「ヤンデレ地獄にしてハーレム地獄だった」
    SaveData.Title = "ヤンデレ地獄にしてハーレム地獄だった"

    --//BG：メインストリート（学園祭）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    --//BU：アキラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0918.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Normal
 "How was it? Did you get along well with Lira-san and Hiyu-san?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0528.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal
 "Hiyu, as I heard, is a total pervert and our conversations didn’t click, but surprisingly, I hit it off with Lira Hoozuki." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0529.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal
 "It somehow doesn’t feel like it’s our first meeting. We immediately understood each other on otaku topics too." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0919.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smile
 "That’s great! Lira-san used to be an otaku and knows a lot about fashion, so I thought you might get along well with Akira!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0530.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal
 "You said that before. Hmm, but she also reacted to recent anime topics... so it doesn’t seem like she’s left her otaku side..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0531.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal
 "Well, there’s no way a charismatic JK is an otaku on the same level as me. It must be my imagination." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0920.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smile
 "Did you exchange LINE? Did you connect on Insta or make plans to hang out next time? If not, I can ask Lira-san for you?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0532.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sadness
 "P-Please stop acting like a guardian. What’s with those warm eyes? Are you trying to cool me down by throwing cold water on me?" ]])

    MSG([[ On our way back from the Hakuyou Festival, walking down the main street together, I came across an unexpected pair. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
    --//BU：アキラ（驚き）、ウラン（通常）、オウガ（通常）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ca")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0921.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "W-What’s going on, both of you? It’s rare to meet like this here." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0264.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Smile
 "Erika-san, you coming at just the right moment really helped." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0252.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Smile
 "Indeed. Now the truth will be clear." ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga-kun and Uran-san simultaneously pulled two documents from their pockets and thrust them toward me. ]])

    MSG([[ It was a marriage registration form. My mind lagged behind the situation, and a flood of question marks appeared above my head. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0922.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "W-What’s this? Are you two getting married?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0265.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Serious
 "There’s no way I’d get engaged to such a barbaric ape." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0253.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "That’s my line. I’d rather marry an android than a narrow-minded woman warped by outdated values." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0923.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "T-Then who…?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ They both pointed at me in unison. ]])

    MSG([[ I looked back, thinking someone was behind me, but no one was there. ]])

    MSG([[ Turning back to face them and hesitantly pointing at myself, both Uran-san and Ouga-kun smiled and nodded. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0924.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Flustered
 "M-Ma—marriage registration with me!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I let out a strange voice for the first time in a while. ]])

    MSG([[ I don’t understand at all. What are they both talking about? Are they teasing me? ]])

    MSG([[ But both Ouga-kun and Uran-san have very serious expressions. ]])

    MSG([[ Neither of them are the type to joke around like this, so I think they’re serious. ]])

    MSG([[ That’s why I’m even more confused, just utterly at a loss. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0266.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Smile
 "Erika-san, you said it yourself earlier." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01oa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0267.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Yandere
 "No matter what hardships or misunderstandings arise, our love is eternal. I want to monopolize your smile." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0925.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Flustered
 "T-That’s just part of the play! Also, the part about monopolizing only means while we’re on stage..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0268.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Yandere
 "No need to be shy. Now, like Beauty and the Beast, let us nurture true love together." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0254.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "Seriously, women driven by delusions are troublesome." ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga-kun stepped between me and Uran-san, interrupting her questioning. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0255.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Smile
 "Don’t worry, Ms. Erika. I won’t trouble you with any nonsense." ]])

    MSG([[ His reassuring words gave me a bit of relief. ]])

    MSG([[ I’m glad Ouga-kun seems to be listening properly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0256.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Smile
 "Because at the moment our dance in the Princess Election defeated Ryuguuin, our hearts became one." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0257.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Smile
 "I’ve been searching for the supreme Yamato Nadeshiko like you. Now, marry me." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0926.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Flustered
 "D-Dance…!? N-No, that dance isn’t really connected to an engagement…" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0258.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Smile
 "No need to be embarrassed. When a man and woman touch skin that closely and connect their hearts, moving many spectators, it’s not an exaggeration to call it a brief wedding ceremony." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0927.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Flustered
 "T-That’s way too much of an exaggeration!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0928.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "Besides! Uran-san and I are both girls! And Ouga-kun isn’t even old enough to marry! I-I think it’s impossible!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01oa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0269.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Yandere
 "I’ve looked up the countries where same-sex marriage is recognized. There’s no problem at all." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0259.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Smile
 "We don’t have to be bound by this country’s rules. True love can overcome any obstacle." ]])

    MSG([[ Unfortunately, it’s not true love. It’s fake love. A misunderstanding. Only problems. ]])

    MSG([[ Neither of them listen to me at all. What should I do…? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0270.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Serious
 "Ouga Rokujou. Disappear immediately. Erika-san is troubled." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0271.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Serious
 "A crude gentleman like you is unworthy of a wonderful woman like Erika-san." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0260.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "You go away, you impure same-sex meddler. Your 'love' is nothing but an inexperienced female’s mirage of lust induced by the suspension bridge effect." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0272.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Serious
 "Enough. My love is pure and innocent. It is a never-binding story never to run out of love." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0261.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "Did you mean 'never-ending'? Why did you suddenly start fixing your foot to the bicycle pedal? Which of us is uneducated? Ridiculous." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BUL_AKI01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0533.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal
 "Minachin, now’s our chance." ]])

    MSG([[ Ignoring the quarreling Ouga-kun and Uran-san, Akira quietly whispered in my ear. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BUL_AKI01ka")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0534.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Grin
 "While those two are fighting, let’s sneak away. We have something important to do after this." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0929.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Wry smile / Sweat
 "Y-You’re right. Sorry about this, but let’s take our leave." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",500,false)

    MSG([[ Taking up Akira’s suggestion, we quietly slipped out of the academy without the two quarreling noticing. ]])

    MSG([[ Then we boarded the bus heading to the station. ]])

    --　　　　　◆
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    --//BG：病室（マリカ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    --//BU：アキラ（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ After leaving the academy, we headed to the hospital room where Marika-neesan is admitted. ]])

    MSG([[ Facing Marika-neesan who continues to sleep as before, I began my now customary progress report. ]])

    MSG([[ I told her about my conflict with the conservative faction at Yuriai Academy. ]])

    MSG([[ Ultimately, I reconciled with the conservative students in my class and formed bonds with them. ]])

    MSG([[ I fought and barely won against Uran-san, the leader of the conservatives, in the Princess Election. ]])

    MSG([[ Also, my antagonism with Uran-san has eased, and it seems we can return to a close relationship like before. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0930.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smile
 "Uran-san said she knows a clue regarding Marika-neesan’s case." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0931.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smile
 "We’re finally getting close to a clue. Soon, we might be able to save Marika-neesan." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0932.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Tearful smile
 "So, just a little longer... please wait a little longer." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ After saying just that, Akira and I turned on our heels and prepared to leave the hospital room. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0535.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Surprised
 "Ah, those flowers..." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira seemed to notice something and pointed beside Marika-neesan. ]])

    MSG([[ There were three vivid red roses displayed in a vase on the bedside table. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0933.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Come to think of it, someone always changes the flowers, right? Maybe Mom?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0536.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious
 "No... Minachin’s mom wouldn’t put roses that remind you of blood in the hospital room. I know who gave those roses." ]])

    --//BG：病院の廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG010aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Saying so, Akira pulled me by the hand and led me into the hallway, continuing with a serious expression. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0934.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "W-What is it, Akira? You look so serious." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0537.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious
 "I didn’t want to upset you before the Princess Election, so I didn’t say anything, but actually, I saw it this morning." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0538.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious
 "Your close friend visited that hospital room and was confessing to Marika." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0935.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Flustered
 "Eh…!? W-Who was it…?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Hearing an unexpected name, I was speechless. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0539.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious
 "It matched perfectly the photo you showed me, so there’s no mistake." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0540.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious
 "That was definitely... Daria Himegami." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0541.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious
 "She spoke with her own mouth that she’s the one who pushed Marika to the edge." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0936.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "D-Daria-san... pushed Marika-neesan...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Impossible. That can’t be. Daria-san often talked about how close she was with Marika-neesan. ]])

    MSG([[ She never seemed to lie and has helped me a lot. ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t believe Daria-san did something like that until I hear the truth directly from her. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0937.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "...Thank you, Akira. When I see Daria-san next, I’ll ask her about the truth." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0938.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "Maybe it’s a misunderstanding. Yeah, it is... because Daria-san is such a good person." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ --There’s no way Daria-san is the culprit. I repeated the same words over and over to convince myself. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_33")
end
